title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 25 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 25 2022
description:
Bloomberg reports Elon Musk will take over Twitter on Friday, take company private. Court rules New York State should reinstate workers fired for not getting the covid shot. KJP blames Trump for shutting down schools. Biden gets 5th covid shot, Dr. Jha says we should get vaccinated for covid every year -- just like the flu. Matt Jacobs, congressional candidate in California’s 26th district, joins Clay and Buck to talk about the huge issues in his huge state. Biden asked about NY ruling on covid shot firings. Transgender TikTok influencer says we need to normalize women with bulges in their shorts. No, that bulge is called a penis.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
